section.title: Titles
section.p: Titles longer than 55 characters get cut off in Google search results.

dlentry.dd: Titles longer than 55 characters get cut off in Google search results. If your title needs to be this long, make sure you frontload the important information.

section.title: Short descriptions
section.p: Accurately describe your page, making sure you describe both the content and the value to your user. Stay within the 164 characters limit, or put the important information at the beginning.
